about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 202: Galactic Core

Attention! This cycles Galactic Core Cadets will now assemble! I count a full 23 token graduates this year! A full range of male and female cadets with standard laser weaponry and dress uniforms, as well as a Wolfen and some other Rimworld alien races, and yes heavy armored security detail, even a few cyber augmented Freelancers, alongside the mechanized support machine detachment! Absolute bad asses, fallout and prepare for deployment for the next campaign!
